item.title: Omg why wont it work?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

[quote=“blinkidy, post:1, topic:167602”]is there away i can restrict items like white plate body to admin only so only admins can wear, and how can i set the lvl for someone to use an item like abby whips i want to let lvl 3’s be able to use them

Public int getCLAttack.

if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == whitePlate && playerRights <= 1) {
deleteItem(whitePlate, (getItemSlot(whitePlate)), 1);
}

Or something like that.

and then they said you have to change with item id it still dident work so anyhelp!![/quote]

From what I remember shouldn’t it be

if((playerEquipment[playerChest] == whitePlate) && playerRights <= 1) {
deleteItem(whitePlate, (getItemSlot(whitePlate)), 1);
}

I forget how Anything cheezescape based works anymore…

And whitePlate being the actual number of the item?
